text: Alec Whaites (born 1884) was an English professional footballer who played as an outside left. ==Career== Whaites spent his early career with New Brighton Tower and Linfield. He signed for Bradford City from Linfield in May 1904,Frost, p. 409 and made 12 league and 1 FA Cup appearances for the club,Frost, p. 389 before moving to Oldham Athletic in September 1907. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1884 births Category:Date of death missing Category:English footballers Category:New Brighton Tower F.C. players Category:Linfield F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football outside forwards
title: Alec Whaites
